column2: Choose a patron deity
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Asgorath, god and primordial who created dragons
Zorquan, god of "dragonness".
Astilabor, goddess of acquisitiveness and wealth.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Bahamut, god of honour and valour.
Tiamat, goddess of vengeance and domination.
Sardior, god of neutrality and psionics.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Hlal, goddess of humour and inventiveness.
Lendys, god of justice.
Tamara, goddess of mercy and healing.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
